attributes.action: call on MPs to stand as a mark of respect when he calls the roll of soldiers killed in action
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would show greater respect for those that have given their lives in the service of the country if MPs were to stand in silence when the PM calls the roll of those most recently killed.  Seeing MPs seated and in some instances slouched on the benches gives the impression that they regard it as a chore to have to listen.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
